HomePage.heroTitle: Researching Brain Development Through Children's Media
HomePage.heroSubTitle: MRI, Computer Vision, and 4,000+ Labeled Sesame Street images
HomePage.researchDescription: Discover how our interdisciplinary research is advancing understanding of child development through innovative computer vision and neuroscience approaches.
HomePage.stillsTitle: Labeled Stills Powered by YOLO ML Model

deepMRIStudies.title: Dense Longitudinal Studies
deepMRIStudies.description: Explore our groundbreaking DeepMRI studies that leverage advanced machine learning techniques to analyze brain development in children. These studies provide new insights into cognitive and neural growth patterns.

multiLabCollaboration.title: Multi-Lab Collaboration
multiLabCollaboration.description: Learn about our collaborative efforts across multiple research labs to enhance the study of child development. This initiative fosters innovation and knowledge sharing among experts in various fields.

aiAndMachineLearning.title: AI and Machine Learning
aiAndMachineLearning.description: Discover how AI and machine learning are being utilized to advance research in child development. This includes innovative applications of computer vision and data analysis techniques.

minnesota.alt: The University of Minnesota Twin Cities

texas.alt: The University of Texas at Austin

ExplorePage.exploreDescription: Browse and search through annotated images from the Sesame Street Archive.
ExplorePage.browseCta: Browse {count, plural, =0 {no images} =1 {# image} other {# images}}

tips.annotated: Green dots indicate images with annotations
tips.categories: Images can have multiple category tags
tips.filters: Use filters to find specific types of content
tips.search: Search by filename or annotation keywords
